Community Partners.name: Friends of Figma, Philippines
description: Figma's vision is to make design accessible to everyone. Friends of Figma exists so users of this collaborative design tool can come together to help each other; lifting everyone up. It’s run by the community and everyone is welcome. The Philippine chapter of Friends of Figma was started in 2018 and it's the first of its kind in Asia.

Community Partners.name: UXSEA Society
description: UXSEA Society is a trusted non-profit UX community that unifies, connects, and support all-level UX professionals, enthusiasts, and students across SEA through knowledge-sharing and collaboration with local communities.

SouthEast Asia is diverse, young, and vibrant. The Design problems and UX practice here can be different in many aspects when compared with geographies like North America, UK and the EU. Underlying reasons for this diversity is the significant variation in culture, language and larger income gaps.

By connecting fellow UXers residing in Southeast Asia, we hope to build connections and conversations that will help the understanding and growth of UX practice in the region.UXSEA Society is non-profit and an officially registered entity.

Community Partners.name: Design Buddies
description: Design Buddies is an inclusive community for designers from all backgrounds to connect, share resources, and participate in virtual events. We have mentorship programs, workshops, AMAs, portfolio reviews, and more. All for free.

Community Partners.name: UXDVO
description: A non-profit community for user experience design practitioners and digital designers from Davao City and neighboring Mindanao municipalities.

Community Partners.name: Developh
description: Developh is an international student-led nonprofit accelerating technology & experiences for social good.

Community Partners.name: PWA Pilipinas
description: The community organization for Progressive Web Apps (PWA) enthusiasts, designers and developers in the Philippines.

Community Partners.name: Ambidextr
description: Ambidextr is a full-service content marketing studio backed by Future Now Ventures. They are the communications arm of some of Asia Pacific’s leading tech companies, who they partner with to usher in the future through great content and creative. While Ambidextr works primarily with tech companies, they are open to collaborating with any individual, company, or organization that wants to prepare their brand for the new digital economy.

Community Partners.name: Roots
description: Roots is a podcast about the stories of Filipino designers. It’s a safe space to be vulnerable and share about who they are. Guests talks about their career journeys, quirks, hobbies, techniques, life aspirations, and what makes them tick.

Community Partners.name: CebUXD
description: CebUXD is the first user-centered design community in Cebu where UX practitioners and enthusiasts can freely share design ideas, experiences, and techniques that helps grow and cultivate UX in the region.

Community Partners.name: Streets to Schools
description: Streets to Schools (STS) is a youth organization founded by young leaders aged 12 to 15 back in 2017. STS aims to bring quality education to impoverished students, and to provide opportunities for all children, regardless of social status. Furthermore, it aims to intersect the advocacy of both the United Nations’ Sustainable Development Goals (SDGs) and United Nations Conventions on the Rights of the Child (UNCRC) in their initiatives. By following and acting on these goals, it believes that it can make the state of Education for Sustainable Development in the Philippines more inclusive and of better quality.

Community Partners.name: Philippine Tech Community Leads
description: PH Tech Community Leads is a community of tech leaders that aims to produce and empower tech community leaders through continuous advocacy, collaboration and education to improve IT skills and culture in the Philippines.

Community Partners.name: QBO Innovation Hub
description: QBO (‘ku-bo’) is the country’s first public-private initiative for startups and it’s our mission to create a globally competitive startup ecosystem in the Philippines.

Community Partners.name: Slash Ignite
description: SlashIgnite is a social innovation studio based in Iloilo City. We help innovators build impactful & profitable social ventures, through social innovation training, ecosystem & venture building.

Community Partners.name: re:MAKE
description: re:MAKE is a community platform designed to amplify, connect and empower innovators and change-makers in South East Asia. It provides a way for members to collaborate, share knowledge, inspire each other and build capability in leading practices.

Community Partners.name: UX+
description: UX+ produces events for aspiring & seasoned User Experience professionals. We invite speakers & instructors that are the most renowned UX designers and researchers from Southeast Asia all the way to Silicon Valley.

Community Partners.name: Rappler
description: A social news network where stories inspire community engagement and digitally fuelled actions for social change.

Community Partners.name: Developer Student Club Loyola
description: DSC Loyola is a part of the Developer Student Clubs Philippines which are independent university-based groups. In DSCs, students grow their knowledge in a peer-to-peer learning environment and build solutions for local businesses and their community. We believe student clubs are essential in the collective learning and development process that will have a larger and sustainable effect in our future. The DSC Loyola community at the Ateneo de Manila University has shown great interest in this vision which now has over 350+ student members in its campus, making it one of the biggest DSC chapters in Southeast Asia!

Community Partners.name: Summit Media
description: Summit Media is a digital lifestyle network in the Philippines, with 14 media brands attracting around 31 million monthly unique visitors and approximately 33 million social media followers.

Community Partners.name: Esquire
description: Esquire Philippines is a thought-leading network for well-connected men and women who are ambitious in their lives and are determined to shape the world.

We are their essential manual on how to lead a richer, better, fuller, and more meaningful life. Our goal is to help them know what to do in every situation in life, as well as to enlighten and educate them so they have an opinion about all aspects of the culture in which they live.

Community Partners.name: UX Thailand
description: UX Thailand begun as a series of monthly meet-ups, focused on empowering the local community to do great design. When we looked to push this further, The UX Thailand conference was born.

A non-profit, meaning the organisers are all volunteers, we don’t get paid. The money that is made is invested in further empowering the local community. We’ll use revenue to provide more regular events like our monthly meet up, training courses throughout the year and hope to build relationships across APAC.
With all of this, we hope for Thailand to become a globally recognised leader in design.

Community Partners.name: Cosmopolitan - Summit Media
description: Cosmopolitan Philippines is the top-of-mind digital brand of every Pinay claiming her defining decade—her twenties. Cosmopolitan serves to inspire, encourage, and empower her to go after her dreams, live her best life, and be in control of her body through informative, entertaining, and relatable content.

General Sponsors.name: Toasty
description: Toasty is a video meeting platform that focuses on driving online collaborations in meetings and workshops. It comes with built-in activities, breakout rooms, integration with Miro and Google Doc, to empower collaborations and drive outcomes.

General Sponsors.name: Amazing Design People List
description: ADPList is an online community platform for designers to find and book mentorships and events.

General Sponsors.name: Icebreaker
description: Icebreaker is an online event platform that connects everyone at your company, university, or community — even while working remotely. Build community, culture, and connection today.

General Sponsors.name: PayMongo
description: PayMongo is a payment platform for the modern business that allows anyone to easily accept online payments from their customers online via credit cards, e-wallets and over-the-counter.

General Sponsors.name: UXR Collective
description: UXR Collective is the best place to learn about UX research. Sign up today for new research talks, case studies, and shows published every week for just $12/month.

General Sponsors.name: DTI - Design Center of the Philippines
description: The Design Center of the Philippines is the country’s leading agency committed to cultivating a culture that thrives on creativity, value creation, and innovation.

Design Center’s efforts go beyond promoting the value of good design and onto inspiring creative industries to create human-centered products, services, and spaces that make an impact in the Philippines and in the world. From enhancing human experiences to enabling inclusive and sustainable economic growth, we ensure that design plays its role as a creative, strategic, and innovative tool for positive development.

General Sponsors.name: InVision
description: InVision is the world’s most powerful design prototyping tool.
Quickly transform your designs into beautiful, fully interactive prototypes complete with gestures, transitions & animations for web, iOS & Android.

A lot of companies, big and small, that are creating digital properties (like websites or mobile apps) use InVision to communicate across their teams and get through the design process faster and more efficiently.

General Sponsors.name: Anflo Management & Investment Corp.
description: Established in 1977, the Anflo Management and Investment Corporation (ANFLOCOR) is the management and investment company of the ANFLO Group of Companies, founded by the Floirendo family’s patriarch, Don Antonio O. Floirendo, Sr.

The Mindanao-based business conglomerate is engaged in a diverse range of industries, including agriculture (production and export of Cavendish bananas, livestock operations), industrial (container port terminal, storage facilities, manufacturing of packaging materials and labels, trucking services, aerial spray and helicopter charter services), real estate (residential and commercial developments) and tourism (resort and franchise hotels operations). The ANFLO Group also has companies that are into construction, retail, consumer financing, radio broadcasting, and security agency.
The ANFLO Group continues to grow and expand while remaining true to its commitment to the development and upliftment of the people of Mindanao.

General Sponsors.name: UXTesting
description: UXTesting Inc. is the leading user experience (UX) data and insight company, devoted to the optimization of User Experience. We firmly believe that Business Intelligence (BI) provides corporates with unfair market insights and better UX to gain a competitive advantage. With UXTesting’s innovative BI solutions, it is much more efficient and effective to uncover actionable data in the fast-changing industry. To learn more visit www.uxtesting.io, or contact UXTesting at social@uxtesting.io.

Premium Sponsors.name: Figma
description: Figma is a design platform for teams who build products together. Born on the Web, Figma helps the entire product team create, test, and ship better designs, faster.

Premium Sponsors.name: Make Technology
description: Make is a full-service, digital and innovations agency. As an Ace Saatchi & Saatchi company, we help brands drive innovation and user experience through powerful, game-changing technology. Design-led innovation drives our foundation, with user experience at our core. We develop products and services that are inclusive and accessible to everyone, everywhere. This, together with a deep understanding of our client’s business and goals, helps us create beautiful, functional, human-centered designs. With offices in the Philippines and Hong Kong, and with continued global expansion, our goal is to provide the resources and technology, no matter how big or small, to help our clients Make The Future Now.

Premium Sponsors.name: Accenture Public Limited Company
description: Accenture is a global professional services company with leading capabilities in digital, cloud and security. Combining unmatched experience and specialized skills across more than 40 industries, we offer Strategy and Consulting, Interactive, Technology and Operations services—all powered by the world’s largest network of Advanced Technology and Intelligent Operations centers. Our 506,000 people deliver on the promise of technology and human ingenuity every day, serving clients in more than 120 countries. We embrace the power of change to create value and shared success for our clients, people, shareholders, partners and communities. Visit us at www.accenture.com.
